WorkItem.ClosedComment: This works for me. How are you running the output .js files? Note that you will need to make sure whatever JS runtime you're using loads calling.js before caller.js.
WorkItem.Description:
When you want to name your modules like namespaces. You get a code generation problem in the javascript output. I don't know what the solution should be, otherwise I would have included a solution.

See caller.ts and calling.ts included for an example of the problem.
